metadata.title: CVE-2017-0450 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in Audioserver could enable a localmalicious application to execute arbitrary code within the context of aprivileged process. This issue is rated as Moderate because it is mitigatedby current platform configurations. Product: Android. Versions: N/A.Android ID: A-32917432.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
